archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1005
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be incentivised before I give you more details about myself to make it worth my while

properties.value: [CLM] To be clarified, as per my understanding we can use progress bars related to offers/rewards for filling personal information as well as some surveys related to progress and reward customes for filling those in. What type of incentivising ?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
